scripts.build-js: tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run uglify-js && header wwwroot/js/pacem-apps/*.js
scripts.build-css: lessc --clean-css --modify-var="shell_selector='html[apps]'" --modify-var="shell_only=true" --modify-var="full_theme=false" --modify-var="theme=theme-phousys" node_modules/pacem-less/pacem/pacem.less wwwroot/css/pacem-apps-shell.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="shell_selector='html[apps]'" --modify-var="shell_only=false" --modify-var="full_theme=false" --modify-var="fonts=fonts-phousys" --modify-var="theme=theme-phousys" node_modules/pacem-less/pacem/pacem.less wwwroot/css/pacem-apps-content.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run copy-shared-js
